name: The Reapers Garden
description:
The Reapers Garden

This is a game where you  Death(the Reaper), will have to collect tormented souls in order to grow your garden.

To win/Complete the game you must grow all of the flowers in the Garden.

Now lets see how many flowers you can grow!!!

Controls:

W,A,S,D to move.

LEFT SHIFT To Sprint.

LEFT MOUSE CLICK or SPACE to shoot.

E to place flowers when close enough.

Mouse to Aim in desired direction.

Reason behind the making:

This Game was made for the B&W Game Jam, with the theme of "Death is a new begging". In this jam we were also only allows to use 2 Colours, which is why the game looks how it does.

Your are Death (the Reaper) and by defeating the dead's tormented souls, you can start the new beginning of your garden as well as the new beginning of the flowers life in it.
